channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: NYT紙、第2四半期の売上高は前年同期比6.3％増の5億9,090万ドル、調整後営業利益は9,220万ドル、購読者数は988万人、購読料収入は4億9,960万ドル（Katie Robertson／New York Times）
item.description:
Katie Robertson / New York Times:
The NYT reports Q2 revenue up 6.3% YoY to $590.9M, adjusted operating profit of $92.2M, 9.88M subscribers, and $409.6M in subscription revenue  —  The company added 180,000 new digital subscribers in the latest quarter, and now has nearly 10 million subscribers in total.

item.title: イーロン・マスクが数え切れないほど発表を撤回した後、ビジネスメディアはX、マスク、そしてマーク・ザッカーバーグとの戦いについての報道を考え直す必要がある（Casey Newton/Platformer）
item.description:
Casey Newton / Platformer:
After the countless times Elon Musk has walked back announcements, the business media must rethink its coverage of X, Musk, and the fight with Mark Zuckerberg  —  After a weekend of whoppers about X and fighting Mark Zuckerberg, the press should take a more skeptical approach

item.title: ある作家が、自分の名前でアマゾンにアップロードされた複数の "ゴミのような本 "を発見した（おそらくAIが作成したもの）。
item.description:
Jane Friedman:
An author finds multiple “garbage books” uploaded to Amazon under her name, most likely AI-generated, and on Goodreads, which removed them after her complaint  —  Update: Hours after this post was published, my Goodreads profile was cleaned of the offending titles.

item.title: The Times』紙の死亡記事ライター、ダミアン・アーノルドへのインタビュー：彼の勤務時間、株式死亡記事、正しい死に方、2008年に初めて書いた死亡記事などについて（Killian Faith-Kelly/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Killian Faith-Kelly / Press Gazette:
An interview with The Times obituary writer Damian Arnold on his workday, stock obituaries, the right way to die, writing his first obituary in 2008, and more  —  “The first thing I do when I wake up in the morning is check to see who's dead.”  —  Imagine that, over the course of your life …

item.title: リオネル・メッシがMLSにやってくることで、アップルは海外のTV+加入者を獲得できるかもしれない。
item.description:
Alex Webb / Bloomberg:
How Lionel Messi coming to MLS may help Apple attract international TV+ subscribers, as the service has almost no content made for non-English-speaking markets  —  Lionel Messi may be just what Apple TV+ needed.  But first...  Apple TV+ has come a long way in a relatively short period of time.

item.title: 2万7000冊以上の書籍の言葉の「生々しさ」を比較・ランキングしたサイト「Prosecraft」が、AI利用の可能性をめぐる作家の反発を受けて閉鎖（Amanda Silberling/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Amanda Silberling / TechCrunch:
Prosecraft, a site that compiled 27K+ books to compare and rank the “vividness” of their language, shuts down after writers' backlash over its possible AI uses  —  On Monday morning, numerous writers woke up to learn that their books had been uploaded and scanned into a massive dataset without their consent.

item.title: ソーシャルメディアがファッション、美容、ライフスタイル雑誌業界を破壊した後、一部の女性たちはフェイスブックのグループやSubstackにキュレーションされたお薦めを求めている（Sapna Maheshwari/New York Times）。
item.description:
Sapna Maheshwari / New York Times:
After social media upended the fashion, beauty, and lifestyle magazine industries, some women turn to Facebook Groups and Substack for curated recommendations  —  People still want to know what to wear and what is actually worth buying — and they want to trust the person telling them.

item.title: 50人以上のマーベルVFX従業員グループがIATSEの代表となることを決議、VFXプロフェッショナルが結束して組合を結成するのは初めてのこと（Chris Lee/Vulture）
item.description:
Chris Lee / Vulture:
A group of 50+ Marvel VFX employees votes to be represented by IATSE, marking the first time VFX professionals have banded together to form a union  —  Call it the Hollywood-labor-organizing version of Avengers Assemble!  On the heels of more than a year's worth of damning disclosures around …

item.title: アップルは大物キャストを起用した質の高い脚本コンテンツでHBOを "アウトHBO "しているが、視聴率、契約数、収入における配当は不透明（The Ringer）
item.description:
The Ringer:
Apple is “out-HBOing” HBO with quality scripted content filled with marquee casts, but its dividends in viewership, subscriptions, and revenue are murkier  —  Apple TV+ has amassed a rich library of original content in less than four years—with the awards season nominations to prove it.

item.title: パラマウント、第2四半期の売上高は前年同期比2％減の$7.6B、損失は$250M、サブスクリプション収入は前年同期比47％増の$1.20B+、Paramount+の加入者数は約70万人増の約61M（Caitlin Huston/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Caitlin Huston / The Hollywood Reporter:
Paramount reports Q2 revenue down 2% YoY to $7.6B and a $250M loss; subscription revenue grew 47% YoY to $1.2B+; Paramount+ added ~700K subscribers to hit ~61M  —  The media giant reported 60 million paid subscribers for Paramount+ last quarter.  —  Paramount Global reached 61 million …

item.title: パラマウント社、サイモン＆シュスター社をプライベート・エクイティ会社KKRに売却する16.2億ドルの合意に達する。
item.description:
New York Times:
Paramount reaches a $1.62B deal to sell Simon & Schuster to private equity firm KKR; the prestigious US publisher was first put up for sale in March 2020  —  The deal, for $1.62 billion, will put control of a cultural touchstone in the hands of a financial buyer.

item.title: NBCユニバーサルは、SAG-AFTRAのストライキによりシーズン2のプロモーションが禁止されている『キリング・イット』シーズン1の最初の3エピソードをYouTubeとTikTokで公開した（Lesley Goldberg/Hollywood Reporter）。
item.description:
Lesley Goldberg / Hollywood Reporter:
NBCUniversal makes the first three Killing It Season 1 episodes available on YouTube and TikTok, as SAG-AFTRA's strike bars its stars from promoting Season 2  —  Without star Craig Robinson to promote the return for season two, NBCUniversal is turning to other alternatives.

item.title: 情報筋WBDはMLBプレーオフの開幕をターゲットに、マックス向けのスポーツ専門チャンネルを立ち上げ、「ブリーチャー・リポート」ブランドを使って若い視聴者をターゲットにする計画（Alex Sherman/CNBC）
item.description:
Alex Sherman / CNBC:
Sources: WBD is targeting the beginning of the MLB playoffs to debut a sports tier for Max, planning to use the Bleacher Report brand to target young audiences  —  - Warner Bros. Discovery plans to simulcast live games on cable TV and Max streaming in October.

item.title: TikTok、ライブストリームで開催される音楽コンテスト「Gimme the Mic」を発表、米国の勝者には50K Diamondsが贈られる（米ドル換算レートは不明）（Mia Sato/The Verge
item.description:
Mia Sato / The Verge:
TikTok unveils Gimme the Mic, a music competition hosted on livestreams where the US winner receives 50K Diamonds, the USD conversion rate for which is unclear  —  TikTok will host a music contest similar to popular talent shows like The Voice, the company announced today.

item.title: 英国の地域メディアグループ「ナショナル・ワールド」が、「リアルな英国」「サッカー」「犯罪」をテーマに、スタッフによる短編ビデオを24時間365日放映するFreeviewチャンネル「ショット！」をデビュー（Dominic Ponsford/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Dominic Ponsford / Press Gazette:
UK regional media group National World debuts Shots!, a 24/7 Freeview channel showing short videos by its staff around the themes “real UK”, football, and crime  —  The new channel draws together video shot by the company's reporters around the UK.
